fields.summary: DNS service will return results for services that are in the disabled state.

comments.body: DNS responses for ufs services now include only those that are enabled.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.1-0.25882.38.20170427git9dceff8.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deployed Eucalyptus VPC cloud with multiple AZs and UFS - [hspencer-715-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/715/]

# Create non-eucalyptus account (e.g. {{development-operations}})
# Create and import keypair for admin user of {{development-operations}} account
{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euca-describe-keypairs --region devops-admin@
KEYPAIR	devops-admin	cd:dd:9f:4c:c8:5a:29:ae:e8:81:23:ce:0c:bc:74:49
{code}
# Bundle, upload and register Ubuntu Xenial Cloud Image:
{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euca-describe-images --region devops-admin@
IMAGE	emi-5168f81a	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170501/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	000317210923	available	private	x86_64	machine			instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-twoaz-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}}, create stack:
{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euform-create-stack DevOpsStack --template-file cfn-elb-twoaz-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --parameter ImageId=emi-5168f81a --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000317210923:stack/DevOpsStack/12e54f56-89be-4148-a55f-473a8030bb11
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	DevOpsStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to deploy a 2 availability zone ELB, Nginx deployment on Eucalyptus VPC cloud	2017-05-02T17:24:18.900Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-5168f81a
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	devopsstack-s3loggingbucket-jwsn30itqaowe
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://DevOpsSta-NginxELB-ZUAHHTP9YPJ9X-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Grant write access for '(eucalyptus)loadbalancing' account to bucket for access logging:
{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# aws --endpoint-url http://s3.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ s3api put-bucket-acl --bucket devopsstack-s3loggingbucket-jwsn30itqaowe --grant-write "id=000606479198" --profile devops-admin
[root@g-26-05 ~]# aws --endpoint-url http://s3.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ s3api get-bucket-acl --bucket devopsstack-s3loggingbucket-jwsn30itqaowe --profile devops-admin

    "Owner": {
        "DisplayName": "development-operations",
        "ID": "49fe63365612c949341a142c485558218b401f175d582a45183a041c2f5620e3"
    },

            },

        }
    ]
}
{code}
# Start test that performs a curl against the ELB, and a dig for a user facing service endpoint:
{code}
$ while true; do date; curl -sI http://DevOpsSta-NginxELB-ZUAHHTP9YPJ9X-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com; dig cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com; sleep 1; done >> EUCA-13373-dig-curl-test-v2.txt
{code}
# SSH into two of the UFS servers and stop the {{eucalyptus-cloud}} service:
{code}
[root@g-08-04 ~]# systemctl stop eucalyptus-cloud.service
[root@g-15-12 ~]# systemctl stop eucalyptus-cloud.service
{code}
